summary: Allows Skyforge Steel Weapons to be crafted a the skyforge when smithing level 40 is reached and with the steel smithing perk. Also includes a fix allowing the skyforge steel dagger to be tempered at the grindstone.
descriptionHtml:
Introduction
-----------------

This is an extremely simple mod - Skyforge steel weapons become craftable at the Skyforge when you have attained a skill level of 40 in smithing AND the steel smithing perk. This also includes a fix to allow the skyforge steel dagger to be tempered at the grindstone, so if you have another fix for that, you can disable it as it is already included.

Installation
---------------

Automatic: Use NMM to install
Manual: Extract the esp file in the archive to the data folder in your skyrim directory. Make sure it is then active using the plugin manager of your choice (Skyrim Launcher, Wrye Bash, NMM, etc.)

Permissions
------------

I will ONLY upload my files to SkyrimNexus - if you see this mod anywhere else, I didn\'t put it there! So don\'t bother contacting me if some other cretin has uploaded it on their site, because even if they did ask me, the answer would be \"NO\" followed by the slap of a wet kipper in their face.

That being said, if you want to use this file and upload it as part of another mod or edit and redistribute it in any way, then do me a favour and just drop me a line letting me know that you plan to use it, and also credit me as the original author. That\'s all I ask, and it\'s just common courtesy between modders.
author: SleeperService
